classes.name: DocumentBuilderFactory
classes.description: Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain a parser that produces DOM object trees from XML documents. Use newInstance() to get a factory, configure it, then call newDocumentBuilder() to get a parser.

methods.name: newInstance

returns.description: A new instance of a DocumentBuilderFactory

methods.description: Obtains a new instance of a DocumentBuilderFactory. This static method creates a new factory instance using the platform default implementation.

methods.name: newDocumentBuilder

returns.description: A new instance of a DocumentBuilder

methods.description: Creates a new instance of a DocumentBuilder using the currently configured parameters.

methods.name: setNamespaceAware

params.name: awareness
params.description: True if the parser produced will provide support for XML namespaces; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parser produced by this code will provide support for XML namespaces. By default the value of this is set to false.

methods.name: isNamespaceAware

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce namespace-aware parsers; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which are namespace aware.

methods.name: setValidating

params.name: validating
params.description: True if the parser produced will validate documents as they are parsed; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parser produced by this code will validate documents as they are parsed. By default the value of this is set to false.

methods.name: isValidating

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce validating parsers; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which validate the XML content during parse.

methods.name: setIgnoringComments

params.name: ignoreComments
params.description: True if the parser will ignore comments; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parser produced by this code will ignore comments. By default the value of this is set to false.

methods.name: isIgnoringComments

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce parsers that ignore comments; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which ignore comments.

methods.name: setIgnoringElementContentWhitespace

params.name: whitespace
params.description: True if the parser will ignore element content whitespace; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parsers created by this factory must eliminate whitespace in element content. By default the value of this is set to false.

methods.name: isIgnoringElementContentWhitespace

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce parsers that ignore element content whitespace; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which ignore ignorable whitespace in element content.

methods.name: setCoalescing

params.name: coalescing
params.description: True if the parser will convert CDATA nodes to Text nodes and append to an adjacent Text node; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parser produced by this code will convert CDATA nodes to Text nodes and append it to the adjacent (if any) text node. By default the value of this is set to false.

methods.name: isCoalescing

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce coalescing parsers; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which convert CDATA nodes to Text nodes and append to an adjacent Text node.

methods.name: setExpandEntityReferences

params.name: expandEntityRef
params.description: True if the parser will expand entity reference nodes; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parser produced by this code will expand entity reference nodes. By default the value of this is set to true.

methods.name: isExpandEntityReferences

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce parsers that expand entity references; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which expand entity reference nodes.

methods.name: setFeature

params.name: name
params.description: The feature name (a fully qualified URI)

params.name: value
params.description: The requested value of the feature (true or false)

methods.description: Sets a particular feature in the underlying implementation of DocumentBuilderFactory. Feature names are fully qualified URIs.

methods.name: getFeature

params.name: name
params.description: The feature name (a fully qualified URI)

returns.description: The current state of the feature (true or false)

methods.description: Gets the state of the named feature.

methods.name: setAttribute

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the attribute

params.name: value
params.description: The value of the attribute

methods.description: Allows the user to set specific attributes on the underlying implementation. Attribute names are implementation-dependent.

methods.name: getAttribute

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the attribute

returns.description: The value of the attribute

methods.description: Allows the user to retrieve specific attributes on the underlying implementation.

classes.name: DocumentBuilder
classes.description: Defines the API to obtain DOM Document instances from an XML document. An instance of this class can be obtained from the DocumentBuilderFactory.newDocumentBuilder() method.

methods.name: parse

params.name: is
params.description: The InputStream containing the content to be parsed

returns.description: A new DOM Document object

methods.description: Parses the content of the given InputStream as an XML document and returns a new DOM Document object.

methods.name: parse

params.name: file
params.description: The file containing the XML to parse

returns.description: A new DOM Document object

methods.description: Parses the content of the given file as an XML document and returns a new DOM Document object.

methods.name: parse

params.name: uri
params.description: The location of the content to be parsed as a URI string

returns.description: A new DOM Document object

methods.description: Parses the content of the given URI as an XML document and returns a new DOM Document object.

methods.name: parse

params.name: is
params.description: The InputStream containing the content to be parsed

params.name: systemId
params.description: The systemId which is used for resolving relative URIs within the document

returns.description: A new DOM Document object

methods.description: Parses the content of the given InputStream as an XML document and returns a new DOM Document object. The systemId is used to resolve relative URIs in the document.

methods.name: newDocument

returns.description: A new instance of a DOM Document object

methods.description: Obtains a new instance of a DOM Document object to build a DOM tree with.

methods.name: isNamespaceAware

returns.description: True if this parser is namespace aware; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not this parser is configured to understand namespaces.

methods.name: isValidating

returns.description: True if this parser is validating; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not this parser is configured to validate XML documents.

methods.name: setEntityResolver

params.name: er
params.description: The EntityResolver to be used to resolve entities present in the XML document

methods.description: Specifies the EntityResolver to be used to resolve entities present in the XML document to be parsed.

methods.name: setErrorHandler

params.name: eh
params.description: The ErrorHandler to be used to report errors present in the XML document

methods.description: Specifies the ErrorHandler to be used by the parser. Setting this to null will result in the underlying implementation using its own default error handler.

methods.name: getDOMImplementation

returns.description: The DOMImplementation object

methods.description: Obtains an instance of a DOMImplementation object.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets this DocumentBuilder to its original configuration. DocumentBuilder is reset to the same state as when it was created with DocumentBuilderFactory.newDocumentBuilder().

classes.name: SAXParserFactory
classes.description: Defines a factory API that enables applications to configure and obtain a SAX-based parser to parse XML documents. Use newInstance() to get a factory, configure it, then call newSAXParser() to get a parser.

methods.name: newInstance

returns.description: A new instance of a SAXParserFactory

methods.description: Obtains a new instance of a SAXParserFactory. This static method creates a new factory instance using the platform default implementation.

methods.name: newSAXParser

returns.description: A new instance of a SAXParser

methods.description: Creates a new instance of a SAXParser using the currently configured factory parameters.

methods.name: setNamespaceAware

params.name: awareness
params.description: True if the parser produced will provide support for XML namespaces; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parser produced by this code will provide support for XML namespaces. By default the value of this is set to false.

methods.name: isNamespaceAware

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce namespace-aware parsers; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which are namespace aware.

methods.name: setValidating

params.name: validating
params.description: True if the parser produced will validate documents as they are parsed; false otherwise

methods.description: Specifies that the parser produced by this code will validate documents as they are parsed. By default the value of this is set to false.

methods.name: isValidating

returns.description: True if the factory is configured to produce validating parsers; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not the factory is configured to produce parsers which validate the XML content during parse.

methods.name: setFeature

params.name: name
params.description: The feature name (a fully qualified URI)

params.name: value
params.description: The requested value of the feature (true or false)

methods.description: Sets the particular feature in the underlying implementation of SAXParserFactory. Feature names are fully qualified URIs.

methods.name: getFeature

params.name: name
params.description: The feature name (a fully qualified URI)

returns.description: The current state of the feature (true or false)

methods.description: Returns the particular property requested for in the underlying implementation of SAXParserFactory.

classes.name: SAXParser
classes.description: Defines the API that wraps an XMLReader implementation class. An instance of this class can be obtained from the SAXParserFactory.newSAXParser() method. Provides methods to parse XML documents using event-driven SAX callbacks.

methods.name: parse

params.name: is
params.description: The InputStream containing the content to be parsed

params.name: dh
params.description: The SAX DefaultHandler to use for parsing events

methods.description: Parses the content of the given InputStream as XML using the specified DefaultHandler.

methods.name: parse

params.name: file
params.description: The file containing the XML to parse

params.name: dh
params.description: The SAX DefaultHandler to use for parsing events

methods.description: Parses the content of the given file as XML using the specified DefaultHandler.

methods.name: parse

params.name: uri
params.description: The location of the content to be parsed as a URI string

params.name: dh
params.description: The SAX DefaultHandler to use for parsing events

methods.description: Parses the content described by the given URI as XML using the specified DefaultHandler.

methods.name: getXMLReader

returns.description: The XMLReader that is encapsulated by this SAXParser

methods.description: Returns the XMLReader that is encapsulated by the implementation of this class.

methods.name: isNamespaceAware

returns.description: True if this parser is namespace aware; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not this parser is configured to understand namespaces.

methods.name: isValidating

returns.description: True if this parser is validating; false otherwise

methods.description: Indicates whether or not this parser is configured to validate XML documents.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets this SAXParser to its original configuration. SAXParser is reset to the same state as when it was created with SAXParserFactory.newSAXParser().
